name: biomni-docking-autodock-vina
title: Biomni: Docking Autodock Vina
description: Performs docking using AutoDock Vina with specified parameters
content:
Overview

Performs molecular docking using AutoDock Vina to predict binding modes and affinity of small molecules to protein targets. Essential tool for structure-based drug design and virtual screening.

Input Parameters

  • smiles_list (required): List of compound SMILES strings to dock
  • receptor_pdb_file (required): Path to receptor protein PDB file
  • box_center (required): Coordinates (x, y, z) for docking box center
  • box_size (required): Dimensions (x, y, z) of docking box in Angstroms
  • ncpu (optional): Number of CPU cores to use (default: 1)

Biological Use Case

Fundamental for structure-based drug discovery. Predicts ligand binding poses, estimates binding affinity, and identifies promising lead compounds. Enables virtual screening of large compound libraries, optimization of protein-ligand interactions, and rational drug design based on target structure.

Output

Docking results with binding poses, predicted affinity scores (kcal/mol), and RMSD values for each ligand saved to docking_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
